event.title: Introduction to Free Software at PRTR capacity-building workshop, Berlin, Germany
event.body: On 29 October Bernhard Reiter will give an introduction to Free Software at the PRTR capacity-building workshop, initiated by the German Federal Environment Agency. The workshop will take place from Tuesday 29 October 2013 (all day) to Wednesday 30 October 2013 (morning only) in Berlin, Germany.
